question: A Batch Operating System processes a group of similar jobs ________ user interaction.
In a Multi-Programmed OS, multiple programs run at the same time by managing ________ usage efficiently.
A Time-Shared OS provides each user with a small ________, making it seem like all users are using the system simultaneously.
A Multiprocessor OS is designed to work with computers that have multiple ________.
Google Search is an example of a ________ Operating System.
A Real-Time Operating System (RTOS) is designed to process data and respond ________.
An example of a mobile operating system is ________.
The OS function responsible for managing CPU execution time is ________.
A Distributed OS connects multiple computers over a ________ to act as a single system.
In a Real-Time OS, even a ________ delay can be critical.
